reuters.title: COMPUTER ASSOCIATES TO ACQUIRE UCCEL CORP FOR ABOUT 800 MLN DLRS
reuters.body: The Panamanian liquified gas carrier Nyhammer, 48,772 dwt, was attacked by an Iranian gunboat on May 24, Lloyds Shipping Intelligence said. One rocket was fired but missed. The vessel subsequently arrived at its destination of Ras Tanura on May 25 and left this morning. REUTER 
